channel.title: SoftLayer_Network_Component_Firewall on SoftLayer API
channel.description: Recent content in SoftLayer_Network_Component_Firewall on SoftLayer API

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_Component_Firewall
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_Component_Firewall Service Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Network_Component_Firewall data type contains general information relating to a single SoftLayer network component firewall. This is the object which ties the running rules to a specific downstream server. Use the [[SoftLayer Network Firewall Template]] service to pull SoftLayer recommended rule set templates. Use the [[SoftLayer Network Firewall Update Request]] service to submit a firewall update request. Local guestNetworkComponentId Unique ID for the network component of the switch interface that this network component firewall is attached to.
